title: List Tags
description: The 'git tag' command lists all tags in the repository.
story: Jerry wants to see all the tags available in the repository. He uses 'git tag' to list them.

game.hint: Use 'git tag' to view all tags in the repository.

title: Create a Lightweight Tag
description: The 'git tag [tag_name]' command creates a lightweight tag pointing to the current commit.
story: Tom wants to mark the current commit as version 1.0. He uses 'git tag v1.0' to create a lightweight tag.

game.hint: Use 'git tag' followed by the tag name to create a lightweight tag.

title: Create an Annotated Tag
description: The 'git tag -a' command creates an annotated tag with a message, author, and timestamp.
story: Jerry wants to create a tag with a description for version 1.0. He uses 'git tag -a v1.0 -m' to include additional details.

game.hint: Use 'git tag -a' followed by a tag name and message to create an annotated tag.

title: View Tag Details
description: The 'git show' command displays detailed information about a specific tag, including the commit it points to.
story: Tom wants to see the details of the 'v1.0' tag. He uses 'git show' to inspect it.

game.hint: Use 'git show' followed by the tag name to view its details.

title: Delete a Tag
description: The 'git tag -d' command deletes a tag from the local repository.
story: Jerry accidentally created a tag with the wrong name. He uses 'git tag -d' to delete it locally.

game.hint: Use 'git tag -d' followed by the tag name to delete it locally.

title: Push a Tag to a Remote Repository
description: The 'git push' command uploads a specific tag to a remote repository.
story: Tom created a tag for version 1.0 and wants to share it with the team. He uses 'git push origin v1.0'.

game.hint: Use 'git push' followed by the remote name and tag name to upload a tag.

title: Push All Tags
description: The 'git push --tags' command uploads all tags to the remote repository.
story: Jerry created multiple tags for different releases and wants to share them all. He uses 'git push --tags' to upload them.

game.hint: Run 'git push --tags' to upload all tags to the remote repository.

title: Force Update a Tag
description: The 'git tag -f' command updates an existing tag to point to a different commit.
story: Jerry realizes the 'v1.0' tag points to the wrong commit. He uses 'git tag -f' to correct it.

game.hint: Use 'git tag -f' followed by the tag name and commit hash to force update it.

title: Delete a Remote Tag
description: The 'git push origin :refs/tags/[tag_name]' command removes a tag from the remote repository.
story: Jerry accidentally pushed a tag to the remote repository and wants to delete it. He uses 'git push origin :refs/tags/v1.0' to remove it.

game.hint: Use 'git push origin :refs/tags/[tag_name]' to delete a tag from the remote repository.
